title: kiDattarkkarum
sahitya:
kiDattarkkarum pEru kiDaittadinnALE un kaDaikkaNNaruLALE rAmA


anupallavi

  ADaikkalam enrun ambuja padamalar aNDinadAlE aDimai enakku menmElE


caraNam    narguru upadEsham nenjam niraindu nargati pera jnAnam pirandadu
 nAnenum pEdamai nalindu maraindu nALum un nAmam nAvil uraindadu
